a.title: Tentative Early Dismissal - Last Day of School

div.div: Tentative Early Dismissal - Last Day of School

div.h4: Please be aware that we are asking anyone who wishes to attend the April 27, 2020 CTSD Board of Education Meeting to register for the meeting here. Registering for the meeting allows us to provide a more secure meeting and will also give us the ability to modify meeting cap limits, should it be necessary

CTSD Schools will observe Spring Break beginning Friday, April 10, 2020 through Friday, April 17, 2020. Remote instruction will resume on Monday, April 20, 2020. No classwork will be posted during the Spring Break. Thursday afternoon, 4/9, was a scheduled Professional Development day for staff. Office hours for staff will end at noon on Thursday. Enjoy time with family and friends safely, and be well.
div.p: The attached letter serves as notice to cover all instructional and related services for general education, special education, ELL and 504. - Remote Instruction Notice
div.h4: Per the instructions from Governor Murphy, the Clinton Township School District will be closed until further notice.
Please be aware that Chromebook login access will be disabled between the hours of Midnight and 6 AM, daily. Students may login to their accounts at all other times during the day.

As a proactive and preventative measure, the Clinton Township School District is sharing information regarding the coronavirus. All of the information released by CTSD can be found on the Clinton Township School District website, here, or on our Health Preparedness website, here.
If your student will be absent from remote learning, please fill out this Absence Request Form
At this time the BOE office is closed. We ask any parents with questions to please email the appropriate party.
div.p: Please see the following important letter from Dr. Cone, Superintendent of Schools - March 19, 2020 Letter

Mission Statement
The Clinton Township School District, in partnership with the community, achieves excellence for each child by ensuring a meaningful and challenging educational experience in a supportive environment; developing life-long learners who are responsible and productive citizens.
